website_summaries.verdict: A simple, out-of-the-way hair dryer holder that requires no installation.
pros: Stores on the inside of a cabinet
Offers room for storing other hair tools
cons: Cannot adjust how low it hangs
Dryer holder may be too small for some hair dryers

customer_reviews.title: Good storage for small space
customer_reviews.text: I have a smaller, under-sink cabinet and this fits well. It's just big enough to hold my curling iron, round brush and hair dryer. It keeps the cabinet less cluttered, and does the job reasonably well. The arms that hold it on the door extend from the body -- probably so it's smaller for shipping and packing. Unfortunately, that makes it a little bit insecure if you open the door too fast. It's not a big deal though. All you have to do is re-extend the arm that fell off and it's good again.
customer_reviews.author: sprosser

customer_reviews.title: Not for little sinks
customer_reviews.text: I'm not dissing this product this is just a warning for anyone for a tiny sink. My sink door wont close my blow dryer is just to big I guess. I wish I had a bigger sink I do like the idea of it though ! I still use this I just cant close my sink door
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Mulumulu

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work For Standard Sized Hair Tools
customer_reviews.text: The functionality of this product is very poor. The hooks fit, and my cabinet still closes.. until I put a hair straightener or blow-dryer in the holder. This holds your hair tools up way too high on the door.. they go way over the top of the holder and too of the door. I can't use this product because the design is a horrible fail. I don't see how anyone could get use out of this unless you are just storing miniature straighteners and miniature blow dryers. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Updated review!
customer_reviews.text: Mine had a missing screw cap and I wrote about it in my old review. The company contacted me immediately and sent me a new one for no extra cost. We emailed for a few days (I sent pictures proving it was missing, they confirmed the color I wanted it in etc.) but they were so polite and prompt each time. I got the piece within about a week of two and this organizer works great. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Kathryn Werner

customer_reviews.title: it's fine!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job for which it's intended, which is to clear wires and appliances from my bathroom counter. I just wish the hooks that hang over the door were slightly thinner. As is, the thickness of the hooks keep my bathroom counter doors unable to close fully, so it's sticking out about 1/4 inch from being flush. Other than that, it's fine!
customer_reviews.author: KJK

customer_reviews.title: Hanger for dryer
customer_reviews.text: Was not what I thought it was but if you want to hang it up on a cabinet door it is fine. I threw it away
customer_reviews.author: auntduke

customer_reviews.title: It at least fits my space
customer_reviews.text: The rack fits my cabinet space, which is great. But one of the handles that fits over the door was bend as soon as I pulled it out of the box, it looked as though it was already defective before it was even shipped out to me. I had my husband carefully bend it to the correct position for using it, and the paint chipped off. Thankfully that part is hidden under the cabinet, but it was just easier to have my husband fix the deformity than deal with returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for what I needed! I have more space under my cabinet now!! I bought 2- 1 I use for blow dryer, straightener & wand. 2nd I use for lotion, body sprays & deodorants. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Worked great in my camper shower, which lacked shelves to hold shampoo.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great in my camper shower, which lacked shelves to hold shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Diana N.

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad holder.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, wish basket was wider so they fit down in better, now the fall out easily. It's nice that the handles have padding to not scratch the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like it extensively. Doesn’t have proper space for my wires/cords for blow dryer and straightener to fit. I’m sure you can find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Student Blogger

customer_reviews.title: Great way to organize!
customer_reviews.text: It fits a hair dryer, straightener and curler. Love this and it makes organizing so much easier!!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small bathrooms!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my apartment bathroom! I don't have drawers, so this helps to keep the clutter down. I like that the hooks are lined with foam, so there's no risk of damage being done to the cabinet door.
customer_reviews.author: Amavanna_14

customer_reviews.title: This was a nice addition to keep myself organized and the heat away ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice addition to keep myself organized and the heat away from other objects in bathroom when I turn it off to cool down. Fit snug on the cabinet door... any smaller and I would have had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: A tad small
customer_reviews.text: Its a bit smaller than expected but gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: M Willem

customer_reviews.title: Organize
customer_reviews.text: Great for that easy to get to organized hair products or tools
customer_reviews.author: Barbara hauber

customer_reviews.title: No complaints. Out of the box ready for use ...
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Out of the box ready for use. Fit perfectly and does not obstruct the door from closing completely.
customer_reviews.author: Ayaili

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the matte black!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great size. Holds my dryer, flat iron and hot air styling/drying brush.
customer_reviews.author: SherryR

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer.
customer_reviews.text: Lifesaver! It freed up a ton of space! I fit a straightening iron and curling iron and blow dryer in it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Helps organize your hair tools!
customer_reviews.text: Fits 1 curling iron, blow dry and and straightener. Doesn’t take up too much space and is hardly noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Ryann

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: So much easier than tangled cords in a drawer. Love this.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good storage
customer_reviews.text: Fits well under bathroom sink, holds 2-3 irons and blow dryer
customer_reviews.author: A.D.

customer_reviews.title: A must!!
customer_reviews.text: Makes it so easy to store my hair dryer n curling irons
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I’m able to put 2 curling irons (1 inch & 1.5 inch) and a straightener inside
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Gives a lot of extra space
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my bathroom, the dryer , some hair brushes and combs fits perfect, and leaves so much space for anther things,
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice organizer for dryer and an iron
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice organizer for dryer and an iron. One thing to be mindful of is that to make sure the cabinet door is long enough. My cabinet door was a short just enough where the bottom of the iron basket almost it the bottom of the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Heesuk

customer_reviews.title: Size is not accurate!
customer_reviews.text: I have a basic Remington hair dryer and it most definitely will not fit. I’m not able to close my bathroom counter cabinet. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived missing a cap on one of the vertical support poles. Because of this, it does not hang correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: It's great in small spaces to maximize storage space
customer_reviews.text: This didn't fit on my bathroom door but I was still able to use it on a bathroom cabinet. It's great in small spaces to maximize storage space. It's sturdy and pretty well made.
customer_reviews.author: Heather T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fits my straightener and blow dryer with room to spare. Love the organization of it!
customer_reviews.author: Darien

customer_reviews.title: It's high quality product
customer_reviews.text: We used it to store hair dryer over the sink cabinet door. It's very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Y

customer_reviews.title: No more clutter
customer_reviews.text: Perfect way to get rid of clutter from your wife's mess
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughters apartment is small. The vanity has no drawers. This makes for a lot more storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: I thought would fit or adjust to any door. I wanted to put up on my bathroom closet door, but it didn't fit. It didn't fit also on my door, any door. I am only using it right now cause I was able to set up on a Hanger behind the door. Not worth the money, and don`t fit a lot of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jessika M.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is so cool
customer_reviews.text: I wish I bought this a long time ago. I can now perfectly organize my straightener and hair dryer perfectly. I am not constantly tripping on the wire, or stepping on it, and they are getting jammed in the door! It gives me more space on my vanity area! I don't even unplug them, just wrap most of the wire when I am done and stick the tool in the right spot and close my sink cabinet door. Its beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Farah

customer_reviews.title: It only fits 3 styling tools... it’s fits curved cabinets doors no problem 👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: If you only have 3 styles tools this is perfect for you. I have 5 and they all don’t fit.. if you have more then 3 you might need to get a bigger one or get two .. 😣 I’m a bit update because all my styling tools didn’t fit.
customer_reviews.author: Bethania

customer_reviews.title: Does not obstruct closing
customer_reviews.text: My fear was that this holder would keep my cabinet from closing properly but it works great. It hangs over the cabinet with out being bulky. Will hold 1 hair dryer and 3 irons depending on the size.
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit over my railing, but it still keeps everything in place. Holds my hairdryer, straightener set, and my foam curls
customer_reviews.author: bern

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: The hanger holder is way tpo small for what I have in my bathroom so it doesnt fit
customer_reviews.author: Andreas Raditya

customer_reviews.title: threw it away
customer_reviews.text: this product didn't fit! one latch did the other didn't, why a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kahele11

customer_reviews.title: Overall, I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: This product is for longer cabinets, not shorter ones; it cannot be adjusted. It's good, does its job. My cabinet is shorter so I had to place it on the outside. But it helps keep the items off my sink and helps me stay organized.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my hairdryer, curling iron and flat iron. It's durable and the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Holds my items exactly the same way the picture shows. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: H. Ervin

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Can't adjust how open it is though
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Can't adjust how open it is though. My cabinet is kinda short and it hangs to the very bottom. If my cabinet was any shorter it wouldn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jacinda

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This is narrow from back to front, but enough width to hold flat iron or curling iron as pictured. However, my hair dryer is too wide to fit into the round space, and the cords, if not wrapped around the iron or dryer looks messy.
customer_reviews.author: PattyW

product_meta.title: mDesign Metal Over Door Hair Care & Styling Tool Storage Organizer Basket for Hair Dryer, Flat Iron, Curling Wand, Hair Straightener, Brush - Hang Inside or Outside Cabinet Doors, 2 Sections - Black
feature_bullets: INSTANT ORGANIZATION: This over the cabinet door organizer keeps all your hair care tools separated, organized and easy to find; Compactly sized so that you can easily store hot styling tools in smaller rooms and spaces; Use outside cabinet doors or inside for more discreet storage

HOT TOOL STORAGE: 2 compartments hold hair dryers, flat irons, curling irons, curling wands, brushes and combs; Wire base tray keeps items secure; 2 hooks for wrapping cords help to corral messy, tangled tools; The steel wire lets you store tools even while they're still hot; Designed to keep tools secure when opening and closing the door

EASY INSTALLATION; Easily installs by hanging over cabinet doors for instant storage - hang on inside or outside of doors; No hardware necessary; Foam pad linings protect cabinet doors from scratches; Perfect for small bathrooms where space is limited; Use in college dorm room, apartments, condos, RVs, campers and more
QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: Made from sturdy steel wire with a durable rust-resistant finish; Soft foam pads behind over door hooks protect cabinets; Easy Care - wipe clean with a damp cloth
THOUGHTFULLY SIZED: Measures 4.8" x 9.1" x 15.6" high; Fits over cabinet doors up to .75 inches / 1.9cm thick

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars166 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
